description:
At the end of 2010 I stumbled onto Elance by accident...it was a chance encounter with a freelancing website that would change my life. 2 years later I had made over $100,000 (all while working less than 5 hours per day) and had formed a team of freelancers to help me fill work orders and keep clients happy. The goal of this course is to teach you the Elance strategies I learned so that you can increase your earnings and generate steady workflow.

In this course you will receive:

  • Lectures detailing my experience with Elance and highlighting the strategies I used to find success.
  • My go-to documents and templates, including correspondence samples, several of my winning proposals, and an in-depth Elance pricing analysis surveying more than 100 job postings and bids that will help you better price your services to make more money on each and every project.
  • Tips for how to generate recurring work from clients and how to make your profile stand out, just to name a few.

If you are looking to take your freelance career to the next level, this course is for you!
title: Freelancing Strategies to Succeed on Elance
